title: 86/657/EEC: Council Decision of 22 December 1986 amending Decision 85/8/EEC on specific Community action to combat poverty
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 22 December 1986
amending  Decision 85/8/EEC on specific Community action to combat poverty
(86/657/EEC)
THE  COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In Article 2 of Decision 85/8/EEC, the first paragraph is hereby  replaced by the following:
'The funds estimated as necessary to implement the measures referred to in Article 1 amount to 29  million ECU for four years (1985 to 1988).'
This Decision shall be published in the  Official Journal of the European Communities. It shall take effect on the fifth day following its  publication.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 December 1986.
For the Council
The President
G. SHAW
